subject: Self Care
title: Why Sleep Exists
description: A short lesson to help you apply Why Sleep Exists.

hook.text: Every animal sleeps. Dolphins sleep with one eye open. Sleep is so vital, evolution never removed it.

buildup.text: Sleep seemed wasteful to scientists for decades. Unconscious hours meant vulnerability to predators.

discovery.text: Research revealed sleep is when the brain clears toxins, consolidates memories, and repairs tissue.

twist.text: Skipping sleep doesn't save time. It destroys the quality of every waking hour that follows.

climax.text: Sleep is not passive rest. It is the most productive thing your body does every single day.

punchline.text: Sleep isn't downtime. It's your body's best work.

quiz.question: Why is sleep considered essential by scientists?
options: It's a leftover habit from evolution
The brain clears toxins and consolidates memories during sleep
